home.title: The reference of the LEGO Fortnite universe!

guides.title: Guides
guides.description: Discover our practical guides for Lego Fortnite! Whether it's building tips or game strategies, our expert advice is here to help you excel in this captivating universe.

news.title: News
news.description: Discover all the latest news about Lego Fortnite! Whether it's new features, updates or events, you'll find all the information you need to stay up to date with the latest news.

wiki.title: Wiki
wiki.description: Discover all the information about Lego Fortnite! Whether it's the list of items, the list of creatures or the list of biomes, you'll find all the information you need to know about this captivating universe.
